step.tex: \begin{align} \int \dfrac{\sec^2 x}{\mathrm{cosec}^2 x}\,dx &=\int \dfrac{\dfrac{1}{\cos^2 x}}{\dfrac{1}{\sin^2 x}}\,dx=\int \dfrac{\sin^2 x}{\cos^2 x}\,dx\\ &=\int \tan^2 x\,dx=\int \left(\sec^2 x - 1\right)dx\\ &=\int sec^2 x\,dx - \int 1\,dx\\ &=\tan x - x + C\\ \end{align}\\ \text{Here, C is the cosntant of integration}
